channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Security Leader’s AI Playbook
item.description: With modern tools and APIs, it no longer takes a massive budget or dedicated AI team to get results.

item.title: Your SOC Doesn't Need More Alerts—It Needs A Brain
item.description: Security teams aren't just drowning in volume; they're operating without a clear sense of what matters most and why.

item.title: From Friction To Flow: How AI Is Reshaping Legal Work
item.description: What’s different now is momentum: AI has not only captured attention but has galvanized legal professionals to engage directly with legal tech.

item.title: Entrepreneurs: A New Standard Has Been Set For Your Seed Round
item.description: A new pre-seed investment report reveals the new reality for startups and the 3 key elements early-stage founders are now measured by

item.title: How Video Game Exploits Predicted ChatGPT College Cheating
item.description: The video game industry's exploit and nerf system has predicted the current education crisis emerging by the unstoppable ChatGPT.
